verses.name: Matthew 14:1
verses.text: At that time Herod the tetrarch heard of the fame of Jesus,

verses.name: Matthew 14:2
verses.text: And said unto his servants, This is John the Baptist; he is risen from the dead; and therefore mighty works do shew forth themselves in him.

verses.name: Matthew 14:3
verses.text: For Herod had laid hold on John, and bound him, and put him in prison for Herodias’ sake, his brother Philip’s wife.

verses.name: Matthew 14:4
verses.text: For John said unto him, It is not lawful for thee to have her.

verses.name: Matthew 14:5
verses.text: And when he would have put him to death, he feared the multitude, because they counted him as a prophet.
